name: Gare Sapphire Mechs
description: A polished top down action shooter set in a digital like world with upgradable mechs.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atomâ„¢ Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 90 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Not a bad top down, bullet hell, shoot until you die, run for cover, scream bloody murder, and click-until-your-hands-fall-off style game. Also, it has MECHS.
Fantastic uninstall simulator.  Although the price seems much, don't think it is really worth $2 either.
